text: Tajja kukwatibwako, wabula ajja kukubirwa ddala amayinja oba kufumitibwa. Omuntu tajja kulama, n’ebisolo tewaabeewo kirama.’ Akagombe bwe kanaamala okuvugira akabanga, olwo abantu ne balyoka bajja awali olusozi.19:13 Alooni ne batabani be ababiri, awamu n’abakadde ba Isirayiri ensavu, be baalinnyanga ku lusozi lwa Katonda (24:1, 9-10)”
